txt.en:
Thank you for bringing me with you when you visited the village of Lhanuch with Corudan, Sigileth, and Driftwood, my friend! I enjoyed hearing the account of your adventures with them before you came to Gondor!

I was struck by the love between Nona and Driftwood, once they were reconciled, and while the memories were still fresh I made this sketch of the two lovers. You are welcome to have it, if you would like it to remember them by.

Caebar
